title: Quick and Easy Instructions to Set Your Samsung Microwave Clock

steps.title: Press Clock.
steps.content: Press Clock . Most models have a clock button that you can press to set the time, including ME18H704SF, ME16H702SE, ME20H705MS, and ME11A7510D.

steps.title: Enter the time.
steps.content: Enter the time. Use the number pad to do this.

steps.title: Press Clock to change AM or PM.
steps.content: Press Clock to change AM or PM. If your model doesn't have AM/PM, skip this step.

steps.title: Press Enter/Start.
steps.content: Press Enter/Start . This might say OK instead. Pressing this button will apply your changes. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press OK.
steps.content: Press OK . The full text on this button is OK/Clock . Models including MG11T5018CC use this method.

steps.title: Adjust the hour using the arrows.
steps.content: Adjust the hour using the arrows. Press the left or right arrow buttons to set the hour that you want. Press OK when you're done changing the hour.

steps.title: Adjust the minutes using the arrows.
steps.content: Adjust the minutes using the arrows. Press the left or right arrow buttons to set the minutes. Press OK when you're done. The display will show the time you set. You'll need to change the time to reflect daylight savings time. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Press Options.
steps.content: Press Options . It's on the right side of the front panel with Keep Warm , and +30 sec . Models including ME21M706BA use this method.

steps.title: Press 9.
steps.content: Press 9 . Pressing this allows you to set the clock.

steps.title: Press OK.
steps.content: Press OK . It's next to Kitchen Timer and Eco Mode .

steps.title: Enter the time.
steps.content: Enter the time. You'll need to manually adjust the time to reflect daylight savings time. Press OK when you're done to display the time.

steps.title: Press and hold Power Level for 3 seconds.
steps.content: Press and hold Power Level for 3 seconds. You'll see a clock icon below the words "Power Level" that indicates that long-pressing that button serves another function. Use this method if you have a ME19R7041F or similar model.

steps.title: Enter the time.
steps.content: Enter the time. You'll need to change this to reflect daylight savings time.

steps.title: Press the Power Level button to set AM or PM.
steps.content: Press the Power Level button to set AM or PM. Press it once for AM and twice for PM.

steps.title: Press OK/START.
steps.content: Press OK/START . This sets the time that you entered.

steps.title: Press My Settings.
steps.content: Press My Settings . It's on the right side of the front panel with Kitchen Timer , and Enter/Start . Use this method if you have a MC17J8000CS or similar model.

steps.title: Press 9.
steps.content: Press 9 . Pressing this allows you to set the clock.

steps.title: Press OK.
steps.content: Press OK . It's next to Kitchen Timer and Eco Mode .

steps.title: Enter the time.
steps.content: Enter the time. You'll need to manually adjust the time to reflect daylight savings time. Press OK when you're done to display the time.
